_sText: GG_ROTARY This is a map I completed a few months back, but I never got around to a public release. Well, here it is! The gameplay is based off of the concept of interlocking circles which rotate in opposite directions at varying speeds. A big thanks to shini for the awesome skybox (Spaced Out). -=Background Information=- A large archaic mechanism in deep space, spinning endlessly for an unknown purpose. Yet there is a purpose for you: kill the enemies in a fast pace game of GunGame while trying to retain your orientation. :::Includes::: - Support for up to 32 Players - Both HDR and non-HDR cubemaps/skybox - A fully-functioning radar/overview - Custom textures All bsp-zipped for easy addition to gameservers!!! NOTE: I'm sure I'll get complaints about it being "too dark". I'd like to make clear that first, its not the lighting but rather my volumetric fog (set at 0 0 0 for black) which is causing this. Secondly, this is to ensure the Gun-Game style play of fast-paced close-combat, not the aim-style of hiding and picking off people at a distance.
